entries.title: Origin

details: **Decision**: Adopted triad structure (`AGENT.md` mandate, `AGENCY.md` memory, `AGENDA.md`
**Rationale**: Matches parent charter triad (AGENTS/AGENCY/AGENDA) ensuring temporal stewardship
(past/present/future).
**Impact**: Guarantees decisions on architecture, UI, and compliance are journaled for
auditability.

**Rationale**: Ensures concurrency correctness and future-proofing; aligns with Wrkstrm canon of
**Impact**: Increases stability, improves CI/CD reliability, and avoids fragmentation.

**Rationale**: Prevents TLS errors on macCatalyst; simpler, more portable.
